title: Trump threatens to intervene in Iran
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened to intervene in Iran where deadly civic unrest is rising over the cost of living.

title: See what Trump did for New Year's Eve
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump hosted a New Year's Eve party with members and guests at Trump's Mar-a-Lago Club in Palm Beach.

title: How tall is Donald Trump's family? NYE pics show heads above the crowd
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has a tall family, from in-law Lara Trump to youngest son Barron Trump. His family is pictured among tallest at the NYE gala.

title: Trump says US will 'come to their rescue' if Iran kills protesters
shortDescription: President Trump vowed the United States will intervene if Iran kills peaceful protesters amid demonstrations in the country over the economy.

title: 'Superstitious' Trump says he takes more aspirin than his doctors want
shortDescription: "They say aspirin is good for thinning out the blood, and I don’t want thick blood pouring through my heart," Trump told the Wall Street Journal.

title: Pics of Trump’s NYE galas at Mar-a-Lago and celebrities who attended
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's Palm Beach, Florida, club Mar-a-Lago hosts a glitzy New Year's Eve party every year. See photos of Melania and Barron Trump.

title: Trump delays tariff hikes on furniture, cabinets amid price concerns
shortDescription: Trump has increased tariffs on a wide variety of products in his second term and has touted the revenues he says they are generating.

title: Trump touts economy, auctions painting at Mar-a-Lago New Year's gala
shortDescription: The president wished for "world peace" but then ignored questions about a reported CIA strike at a coastal facility in Venezuela.

title: Trump 'caused' Jan. 6 Capitol riot, Jack Smith testified to Congress
shortDescription: "Our view of the evidence was that he caused it and that he exploited it," Smith said of Trump's alleged culpability for the Capitol riot.

title: Trump says National Guard leaving major cities
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said in a social media post that he is withdrawing National Guard troops he deployed to Chicago, Los Angeles and Portland.

title: Minnesota governor called to testify before Congress on fraud scandal
shortDescription: The state's Democratic governor was asked by the GOP-led House Oversight Committee to testify before the panel in February.

title: Trump says he's ending push for National Guard in Chicago, LA and Portland
shortDescription: Trump announced Dec. 31 that he's ending his push to deploy National Guard to Democratic-led cities but vowed to send them back if crime rises.

title: Trump says construction of giant arch will begin soon in DC
shortDescription: The president said in a Politico interview on Dec. 31 that his "Triumphal Arch" in Washington will begin construction in early 2026.

title: Boebert hits back after one of Trump's first vetoes targets Colorado
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has issued his first vetoes of his second term, including one that blocks the completion of a water pipeline in Colorado.
